message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.SI 

The paper discusses the security vulnerabilities in the ZigBee IoT standard and proposes recommendations to strengthen security design in future IoT standardization efforts. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the economic motivations behind IoT standardization efforts, which could fall under information retrieval (cs.IR) or software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the proposed recommendations for improving security design could fall under software engineering (cs.SE) or social and information networks (cs.SI).
